Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/25th
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via 31st, Kostner, 26th and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/25th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Kostner, 26th and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/25th.

Allow extra travel time.
